Thus, in Rome, the cultural guerrilla led Via Napoleone to the headquarters of the CasaPound. What is beautiful about CasaPound is that it has created its own golden legend, which is not the dead language of fetishized fascism, which is not an archeological excavation site or a Mussolini mausoleum. The CasaPound is in the colors of Italian modernism otherwise bold than the provincialism of the French avant-garde. In the word culture, the Italians of the interwar period did not come out AndrÃ© Breton, but Gabriele D'Annunzio and the capture of Fiume, in 1919, the scene of an unprecedented libertarian, futuristic and Nietzschean experience. The CasaPound is the taking of Fiume in the 21st century; everything is telescopic: fascism, the avant-garde, squadrons, sunglasses, rock - and squats. It's more than an update on fascism, it's broadband fascism.FranÃ§ois Bousquet
